item.title: Math is incredible
item.description: Maybe I never learned this or maybe I forgot but while reading Prime Obsession I came across a concept that blew my mind. We all learn about infinite series and how some converge (think 1 + ½ + ¼ + .. = 2) and some diverge (1 + ½ + ⅓ + ¼ + ..) but it turns out that not all convergent series are the same. The same numbers, added in a different order, can lead to a different resulting sum.
